original_text: So everyone went to Gilgal. They went to the place where they worshipped the Lord. They all agreed that Saul would be their king. They offered peace offerings to the Lord. Saul and all the Israelites were very happy.
korean_text: 모든 백성이 길갈로 가서 거기서 여호와 앞에서 사울을 왕으로 삼고 길갈에서 여호와 앞에 화목제를 드리고 사울과 이스라엘 모든 사람이 거기서 크게 기뻐하니라

sentences.original_text: They went to the place where they worshipped the Lord.
They all agreed that Saul would be their king.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 모두 사울이 그들의 왕이 될 것에 동의했습니다.

sentences.original_text: They offered peace offerings to the Lord.
Saul and all the Israelites were very happy.
sentences.korean_translation: 사울과 모든 이스라엘 사람들은 매우 기뻐했습니다.
